name: Release 6.4
body:
* Generic [BinarySearch](https://google.github.io/mug/mug-guava/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/BinarySearch.html) algorithm (beyond sorted arrays and lists)
* [MoreIterables](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/MoreIterables.html)

name: Release 5.9
body:
* [toMap(mapSupplier)](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/stream/BiCollectors.html#toMap(java.util.function.Supplier)) `BiCollector` with null support (works around https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8148463).
* Substring [splitKeyValuesAround()](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/Substring.RepeatingPattern.html#splitKeyValuesAround(com.google.mu.util.Substring.Pattern,java.lang.String)):
    ```java
        first(',')
            .repeatedly()
            .splitKeyValuesAround(first('='), "k1=v1,k2=v2")
    ```
* [asMap(Struct)](https://google.github.io/mug/mug-protobuf/apidocs/com/google/mu/protobuf/util/MoreStructs.html#asMap(com.google.protobuf.StructOrBuilder)): protobuf `Struct` to POJO.
* [fromValue(Value)](https://google.github.io/mug/mug-protobuf/apidocs/com/google/mu/protobuf/util/MoreValues.html#fromValue(com.google.protobuf.ValueOrBuilder)): protobuf `Value` to POJO.

name: Release 5.7
body:
* [`Substring.Pattern.then()`](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/Substring.Pattern.html#then(com.google.mu.util.Substring.Pattern)) to support lookahead capability.
* [`addToIfAbsent()`](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/Substring.Prefix.html#addToIfAbsent(java.lang.StringBuilder)) or [`remove`](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/Substring.Prefix.html#removeFrom(java.lang.StringBuilder)) `Substring.Prefix` and `Substring.Suffix` from `StringBuilder`
* `Substring.Prefix` and `Substring.Suffix` implement `CharSequence`.
* `Joiner.join(Collection)`.
* [`MoreStreams.groupConsecutive()`](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/stream/MoreStreams.html#groupConsecutive(java.util.stream.Stream,java.util.function.BiPredicate,java.util.function.BinaryOperator))

name: Release 5.3
body: * `MoreCollections.findFirstElements()`, `MoreCollections.findOnlyElements()` and `MoreCollectors.onlyElements()` to handle short lists with lambda.

name: Release 5.2
body:
* [Substring.Pattern.repeatedly()](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/Substring.Pattern.html#repeatedly())
* [BiStream.consecutiveRunsFrom()](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/stream/BiStream.html#consecutiveRunsFrom(java.util.stream.Stream,java.util.stream.Collector)) for run-length encoding and repeating element summary.

name: Release 4.7
body:
* mug-guava artifact with Guava specific collectors and BiCollectors
* BiStream `mapKeysIfPresent()`, `mapValuesIfPresent()`.

name: Release 4.6
body:
* Substring `removeAllFrom()`, `replaceAllFrom()`, `delimit()`, `iterateIn()` etc.
* `split()` strings to Map, Multimap, BiStream or custom collection.
* `MoreStreams.flatteningMaps()`

name: Release 4.4
body:
* Tarjan's [strongly connected components algorithm](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/graph/GraphWalker.html#stronglyConnectedComponentsFrom(N...))
* [yield()](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/stream/Iteration.html) to turn recursive algorithms into streams.

name: Release 4.2
body: * `Walker.inBinaryTree()` with in-order and more efficient traversals.

name: Release 4.0
body:
Graph utilities.

* [Walker](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/graph/Walker.html) walks (or traverses) a graph or tree as a lazy `Stream`.
* [CycleDetector](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/graph/CycleDetector.html) detects cycles in arbitrary graph topology (Guava's Graph, or others).
* [ShortestPath](https://google.github.io/mug/apidocs/com/google/mu/util/graph/ShortestPath.html) implements Dijkstra algorithm as a lazy `Stream`.

name: Release 3.3
body: `groupingBy(classifier, reducer)` eliminating the need to handle Optional.

name: Release 3.2
body:
* BiCollectors.groupingBy()
* BiCollectors.counting(), summingInt() and friends.
* BiCollectors.collectingAndThen()
* BiCollectors.mapping()
* BiStream.Builder
* BiStream.toBiStream() collector.

name: v2.2
body: * Substring API Redesign (Added Substring.Match class. May be backward incompatible).

name: v2.1
body:
Substring changes:

* More readable syntax: `Substring.before(first(':'))` etc.
* Scoped substring pattern: `first('.').after(first('.'))` etc.
* Convenient shortcuts: `Substring.between(first('<'), last('>')).from(str)`.

name: v2.0
body:
* Substring (string slicing)
* Retryer moved to concurrent package.
* Removed deprecated APIs.

name: Mug 1.11
body:
* Optimized `BiStream` to save intermediary `Map.Entry` allocations for sequential stream.
* `biStream(stream, T::getKey, T::getValue)`.

name: Mug 1.10
body:
* BiStream.neighbors() to return neighboring pairs from a stream.
* Bug fixes.
* Deprecated API deleted.

name: Mug 1.9
body:
* `MoreStreams.generate()` for generating infinite and *finite* streams.
* `MoreStreams.flatten()` as a short-circuitable flatMap(). Especially useful to be called recursively in a long or infinite stream.

name: Mug 1.8
body:
Don't use exception serialization in `Maybe.orElseThrow()`.

Not wrapping the exception may even be a lesser evil compared to serialization, especially for platforms like GWT, Android etc.

Users are however strongly encouraged to use `orElseThrow(WrapperException::new)`.
